briefTitle: Management of LDL-cholesterol With Inclisiran + Usual Care Compared to Usual Care Alone in Participants With a Recent Acute Coronary Syndrome
officialTitle: A Randomized, Controlled, Multicenter, Open-label Trial Comparing a Hospital Post-discharge Care Pathway Involving Aggressive LDL-C Management That Includes Inclisiran With Usual Care Versus Usual Care Alone in Patients With a Recent Acute Coronary Syndrome (VICTORION-INCEPTION)
summary: The purpose of this study is to study the effectiveness of implementation of a systematic LDL-C management pathway including treatment with inclisiran in participants who have experienced a recent acute coronary syndrome (ACS) and have an increased LDL-cholesterol (â‰¥70 mg/dL) despite being treated with a statin drug.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline to Day 330 in LDL-C
